header_text: You are at the park with your child. They ask you to play catch, and your unsteady gait causes you to stumble. Whether or not your child notices, you do not lose confidence in your role as a loving parent to your child.

elements.Text: Will your grandchild still feel loved by you?

elements.name: You are at the park with your child. They ask you to play catch, and your unsteady gait causes you to stumble. Whether or not your child notices, you do not lose confidence in your role as a loving parent to your child._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
